product_name: SEREE Digital Camera 4K Compact Camera with 44MP 16X Digital Zoom, 2.4'' Autofocus Portable Point and Shoot Digital Cameras with 32GB SD Card and 2 Batteries
short_description: SEREE 4K 44MP Vlogging Camera, a versatile and compact device perfect for capturing life's precious moments.  With 4K video and 44MP photo resolution, you can easily switch between modes with the "M" button for seamless recording.  Its 2.4-inch IPS display and 16X digital zoom ensure you never miss a detail, while the built-in flashlight and anti-shake function guarantee clear, steady shots.  With a long-lasting 1200mAh battery and easy USB transfer, sharing memories on social media is effortless.  Ideal for beginners, this lightweight and portable camera makes recording travel, sports events, weddings, and more a breeze, preserving every smile as a cherished memory.

product_name: Popsnap Camera, Green, Ultra-High-Resolution Portable Video Creator with Intuitive Controls, Durable Build, Adjustable Lighting Settings
short_description: Introducing a camera revolution specifically crafted for the dynamic world of TikTok - a device that seamlessly blends functionality with creativity. This camera is meticulously designed to cater to the unique needs of TikTok creators, featuring integrated capabilities that effortlessly tap into trending challenges and effects, empowering you to bring your imaginative content visions to life. With its high-resolution video capture, every frame is rendered in stunning detail, ensuring your videos are not only vibrant but crystal clear, capturing the essence of your creativity in every shot. Understanding the spontaneous nature of content creation, this camera boasts a portable and durable design. Its compact size and robust construction make it the perfect companion for capturing life's moments, anytime, anywhere - from impromptu shoots to meticulously planned productions. Creators can dive deep into their projects without the constant worry of recharging, thanks to the camera's extended battery life that promises uninterrupted creative flow. Designed with all users in mind, the camera features a user-friendly interface, offering simplified navigation and intuitive controls. This makes it incredibly accessible, whether you're a seasoned TikToker or just beginning your content creation journey. Furthermore, it's equipped with adjustable settings for various lighting conditions, ensuring your videos are always shot in the best light possible. With the ability to tweak exposure, brightness, and contrast, creators have the control to produce optimal video quality regardless of the environment. This camera isn't just a tool; it's your gateway to unleashing unparalleled creativity on TikTok, making it an essential device for anyone serious about their content creation game.

product_name: MARVUE Digital Camera 4K 64MP Vlogging Camera for YouTube Auto-Focus 18X Zoom with 3" 180° Flip Screen Compact Video Camera with 32GB Memory Card
short_description: This camera supports ultra-high-definition UHD (4K)/30fps video recording and up to 64 million pixels for photos, with high color reproduction accuracy, and an 18x digital zoom function. It is easy to operate, with a 3-inch IPS high-definition flip screen that can flip up 180° for selfies and easy operation. Portable and pocket-sized, it comes with a 32GB memory card, allowing you to start shooting immediately. Additionally, it comes with two high-capacity batteries, each capable of recording 4K video for up to 80 minutes when fully charged, and can be mounted on a tripod (not included) for stable long-range shooting. It supports flash and fill light shooting, suitable for night shooting and various scenes. With multiple video and photo functions, including loop recording, time-lapse recording, and video pause, it meets different shooting needs, making it an ideal choice for YouTube, Vlogging, and other purposes.

product_name: Melcam 01DC403 44.0 MP 1080P Digital Camera 16X Digital Zoom Compact Point and Shoot Camera, Black
short_description:
MELCAM is a professional manufacturer of digital camera. We are committed to providing you with more fun in your happy moments with our compact camera.

1.This kids camera has extremely high cost-efficiency with retro appearance, equipped with IPS 2.4 Inch LCD screen, FHD 1080P video resolution, 44.0 megapixels and portable design, helping you capture and record the most exciting memorable moments with high-quality images or videos.

2.Equipped with anti-shake, face recognition, smile detection, continuous shooting, self-timer, and flexible capturing the shooting subject.

3.Recording the shooting time, so that you can look it back, you can also choose that the date stamp is on or off.

Self-timer & Selfie Shooting

This kids digital camera can do time delay shooting of 2s /5s /10s according to your needs(PS. please press the ''Left'' Button).

Auto off function saves energy, you can set up the auto off time after 1minutes, 3minutes, 5minutes or No shutdown according to your needs.

1080P 44.0MP & 16X Digital Zoom

This teens Digital Camera equipped with FHD 1080P video resolution and 44.0 megapixels.

This compact digital camera supports 16x digital zoom, you can use the W/T button to zoom in or zoom out the image.

Portable Digital Camera

With a durable lanyard, kids can easily attach it in the hand, easy to carry and moving, preventing the camera from falling.

With a portable carry bag, you can easily carry and store it, at the same time,it is also a pocket camera.

Video Recording & Pause Function

1080P HD video with 2.4 inch IPS LCD display screen, perfect for recording happy moments with friends, family membersand classmates indoors/outdoors.

The pause function allows you to randomly pause when recording or playback videos.

Face and Smile Detection

This mini digital camera for kids/teens/seniors/beginners, greatly capturing smile and detecting human faces in shooting.

Point and shoot camera, this basal camera is super easy to gain quality images and videos, good gift for your kids.

YouTube Vlogging Recording & Webcam

This small camera comes with USB cable and charger adapter, you can connect the digital camera with computer to download images and videos you recorded.

This digital camera also can be used as a webcam,perfect for video calling ,live streaming and so on.

Warm Tips:

1.Please read the user manual carefully before using.

2.The camera is designed for amateurs, not for Professional users.

3.Please format the SD card with your digital camera before the first time to use.

Package List:

1x Digital camera & 32GB SD CARD

2x Rechargeable battery

1x Type-C USB cable

1x Adapter

1x Camera bag

1x Lanyard

1x User manual

product_name: Digital Camera 4K 48MP Vlogging Camera for Youtube Autofocus 16X Digital Zoom Video Cameras with 32GB SD Card
short_description:
1. 4K Video Resolution: Provide video resolution at 30FPS.

2. Autofocus&16x Digital Zoom:Fast and accurate to focus that help you gain high quality image.

3. Include Memory Card: Provide a 32GB SD card (This digital camera support max to 128GB SD Card).

4. HDMI Output Function: Supports both USB and HDMI port, downloading images to compute/TV.

5. Portable Camera: Designed to be suitable for traveling, extremely light weight, and can fit in a pocket or purse.

6. Recording While Charging: It supports charging while shooting, and comes with two batteries and an additional charging stand.

7. Anti -Shake: It can provide you with more stable product quality, making it very suitable for beginners to use.

8. Flash Light: Extra flash function provides you with brighter images and better shooting effects, even in the dark light.


Specifications:

Video Resolution: 4K 30fbs

Image Resolution: 48MP, 44MP, 36MP, 24MP, 20MP, 16MP, 12MP, 10MP, 7MP

Display Screen: 3.0inch 180 degree flip screen

Digital Zoom: 16x

File Format: JPG/ AVI

Focal Distance: f=7.36mm

Output: USB2.0/HDMI Port

White Balance: Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent/Tungsten

Digital Camera Extra Functions Included:

Flash Light; Time-Lapse(2/5/10S); Looping Video; Slow-Motion Video; Continuous Shooting; Face & Smile Detection; Anti - Shake; Multiple Filter Options; Video Pause; Beauty Function Include.

Video Capture Format: 4k

Video Capture Resolution: 2160p, 4320p

Video Standard: AVI

Lens Type: Macro

Zoom Type: Digital Zoom

Audio Input: Microphone

Connectivity Technology: HDMI

Continuous Shooting Speed: 30 fps

Wireless Communication Technology: Wi-Fi

Flash Memory Type: SD


Warm Tip:

1. Please charge vlogging camera when you use the camera first, because the long transportation time, the camera may have lost power.

2. Please format the SD card before use the camera first, for details, please see the user manual. (Support 4-128GB SD card, 32GB SD card included)

3. Make sure there is the SD card in the digital camera before use.

4. It is designed for amateurs rather than professional users, please read the user manual carefully before using.


What's in the box:

1*4K Digital Camera,

1*32G SD Card,

1*User Manual,

1*Charger,

1*Mini USB Cable,

1*HDMI Cable,

1*Lens,

1*Lens Cap,

2*Rechargeable Battery,

1*Camera Bag,

1*Wrist Strap,

1*Cleaning Cloth

product_name: TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera, 4MP Indoor Security Camera Wireless Wifi with Dual Lens, 360°PTZ Security Cameras Outdoor with Full Color Night Vision, Two Way Audio, IP66 Weatherproof, 2.4GHz Wifi
short_description:
The TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera offers exceptional features for comprehensive security. Its 360° coverage, high-definition imaging, full-color night vision, two-way audio, and user-friendly controls make it the ideal choice for any setting. Protect your home, shop, school, or factory with confidence—invest in the TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera and experience peace of mind like never before.

Description：
With its 4MP wireless wifi security camera and dual lenses, the TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera captures every detail with impressive clarity. The high-definition resolution of 1920*1080 ensures sharp and vivid imagery, leaving no room for ambiguity.

What sets this camera apart is its 360° field of view, ensuring no blind spots. Whether indoors or outdoors, you can trust that the TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera has all angles covered.

Night vision capabilities are equally impressive, with eight infrared LEDs and eight white light LEDs providing full-color night vision. Even in complete darkness, you'll have clear visibility of up to 50 meters, ensuring nothing goes unnoticed.

The two-way audio feature enables seamless communication with anyone near the camera. Monitor your children, interact with pets, or communicate with visitors effortlessly.

You'll never miss a moment with multiple storage options. The TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera supports cloud storage for secure off-site access to your footage. Additionally, a TF card slot allows for local storage of up to 128GB.(Not include TF card )

For enhanced control, the PTZ capabilities allow you to remotely adjust the camera's position. With a 355° pan range, 90° tilt range, and 5X zoom, you can focus on specific areas and capture fine details.

Durability is ensured with an IP66 weatherproof rating, allowing the camera to withstand various weather conditions. Extreme temperatures (-20℃ to +55℃) and humidity levels (10% to 90%) won't affect its performance.

The TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera's compact size and E27 interface make it easy to install in any location. It adapts seamlessly to your needs, whether for indoor or outdoor use.

The user-friendly App makes setup and management a breeze. Available for iOS and Android, the app offers easy connectivity options like Bluetooth pairing, QR code scanning, and AP hotspot connection. Stay updated with push notifications and access the latest news.

product_name: TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera, 4MP Indoor Security Camera Wireless Wifi with Dual Lens, 360°PTZ Security Cameras Outdoor with Full Color Night Vision, Two Way Audio, IP66 Weatherproof, 2.4GHz Wifi

Night vision capabilities are equally impressive, with eight infrared LEDs and eight white light LEDs providing full-color night vision. Even in complete darkness, you'll have clear visibility of up to 50 meters, ensuring nothing goes unnoticed.

The two-way audio feature enables seamless communication with anyone near the camera. Monitor your children, interact with pets, or communicate with visitors effortlessly.

You'll never miss a moment with multiple storage options. The TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera supports cloud storage for secure off-site access to your footage. Additionally, a TF card slot allows for local storage of up to 128GB.(Not include TF card )

For enhanced control, the PTZ capabilities allow you to remotely adjust the camera's position. With a 355° pan range, 90° tilt range, and 5X zoom, you can focus on specific areas and capture fine details.

Durability is ensured with an IP66 weatherproof rating, allowing the camera to withstand various weather conditions. Extreme temperatures (-20℃ to +55℃) and humidity levels (10% to 90%) won't affect its performance.

The TOPVISION Light Bulb Camera's compact size and E27 interface make it easy to install in any location. It adapts seamlessly to your needs, whether for indoor or outdoor use.

The user-friendly App makes setup and management a breeze. Available for iOS and Android, the app offers easy connectivity options like Bluetooth pairing, QR code scanning, and AP hotspot connection. Stay updated with push notifications and access the latest news.

product_name: Fujifilm instax Mini SE Instant Camera Bundle, Lavender
short_description: The Fujifilm INSTAX Mini SE Camera Bundle in lavender comes with everything you need to capture those special moments. This bundle starts with the new and stylish lavender Fujifilm INSTAX Mini SE instant camera, but there's more, much more! What's a new instant camera without film? Well, it has an Fujifilm INSTAX Mini Instant Film Pack that has 10 total film sheets to get you started. This bundle also has a lavender Fujifilm INSTAX Mini Photo Album that holds 72 mini photos, a lavender Fujifilm INSTAX Mini SE Camera Case and finally 20 "Celebration" Frame Stickers. This Fujifilm INSTAX Mini SE Instant Camera Bundle has everything, AND WE MEAN EVERYTHING, to capture, decorate and display your Fujifilm INSTAX memories. This Bundle is in Brand New Condition.

product_name: 5K Digital Camera for Photography Autofocus 48MP Vlogging Camera for YouTube 16X Digital with Front and Rear Cameras with 32GB SD Card(Brown)
short_description:
5K Video Resolution & 48MP Image Resolution & Supports 16X Digital Zoom

-This 5K camera can make videos with 5K video resolution at 30FPS & capture 48MP image resolution & support 16X digital zoom, perfect for indoors outdoors.


Warm Tips:

When you use this digital camera for the first time, please read the manual carefully and format the memory card with this camera.

The SD card Slot is Micro SD Card Slot(32GB SD Card Included), 4GB to 256GB Class10 U1 level and above was Recommended(Maximum Support 256GB)

This 5k digital video camera is suitable for beginners and amateurs rather than professional users.


Features

Audio Input: Microphone

Connectivity Technology: USB

Wireless Communication Technology: Wi-Fi

Flash Memory Type: Micro SD/Micro SDHC/Micro SDXC

Special Feature: Pause Function, Continuous Shooting, Time-lapse Shooting, Slow Motion, Motion Detection, HDMI Output

Skill Level: Amateur, Professional

Form Factor: Compact

Photo Sensor Technology: CMOS

Lens Type: Zoom

Focus Type: Auto Focus

Maximum Focal Length: 3.37 Millimeters

Minimum Focal Length: 3.37 Millimeters

Video Resolution: 5K 30FPS; 4K 30FPS; 2.7K 30FPS; 1080P 120FPS; 1080P 60FPS; 1080P 30FPS 720P 240FPS; 720P 120FPS; 720P 60FPS; 720P 30FPS

Image Resolution: 48M(8000×6000); 36M(6880×5160); 24M(5600×4200); 20M(5120×3840) 16M(4640×3480); 12M(4032×3024); 8M(3264×2448); 5M(2592×1944)

Storage Method: 32GB Micro SD memory card included(Maximum Support 256GB)

File Format: Photo/JPG ,Video/MP4

Operating System: Compatible with Chrome OS 29.0.1547 or above, Windows 7/8/10 or later, Mac OS 10.2/10.6 or above, Linux 10.04 or above

Filters: 20 filters such as regular/black and white/red/green/blue, etc

Self-timer: Support

Auto Off: Support

White Balance: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten Light, Fluorescent (H), Fluorescent (L)

Focus Distance & Aperture: Focal Distance: f=3.37mm; Aperture: F/2.2

Power Supply: Rechargeable Battery

Display Screen: 2.8 inches IPS display screen

Screw Mount: Standard 1/4 Inch Tripod Mount Screw

Webcam Function: Support

TV Output: Support


Package List:

1 x 5K Digital Camera,

1 x 32GB Micro SD Card,

2 x Rechargeable batteries,

1 x HDMI Cable,

1 x Type-C USB Cable,

1 x Adapter,

1 x Camera Pouch,

1 x lens/LCD screen cleaning cloth,

1 x Camera Wrist Strap,

1 x User Manual.
